display.title: Acetone
description: While distilling &&aWood Vinegar&&r gives &&aAcetone&&r, the yield is low and might not meet your needs.
You might want to use the direct &&3LCR&&r recipe from &&aAcetic Acid&&r to obtain &&aAcetone&&r.

If you want to be fancy, you can also use the good old &&aAcetic Acid&&r -> &&dDissolved Calcium Acetate&&r -> &&aAcetone&&r loop, which does not require a &&3LCR&&r, but still recycles the Calcium compound perfectly.
We've been talking about Acetic Acid, but we're yet to tell you how to obtain it. Wouldn't that be great?
&&aAcetic Acid&&r can be synthesized in the &&3Chemical Reactor&&r. Our favorite recipe is from &&dEthylene&&r.
